General.Name: Banco Santander Río S.A
General.Description: Banco Santander Argentina S.A. provides various banking products and services to individuals, corporates, business, agro industries, and small and medium-sized enterprises in Argentina. The company offers current accounts, fixed term deposits, mutual investment funds, public and private debt securities, syndicated loans, custody services, cards, insurance products, credits, and digital banking services. It also provides collection, payment, foreign trade, investment, cash management, and transaction services. The company was formerly known as Banco Santander Rio S.A. and changed its name to Banco Santander Argentina S.A. in April 2022. The company is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Banco Santander Argentina S.A. operates a subsidiary of Ablasa Participaciones, S.L.
General.Address: Av. Juan de Garay 151, Buenos Aires, Argentina
